title: Linux Kernel 6.3 Reaches End of Life, Users Urged to Upgrade to Linux 6.4
description:
The Linux 6.3 kernel series reached end of life after being supported for less than three months. The series is no longer actively supported and users are now urged to upgrade to Linux kernel 6.4.

The post Linux Kernel 6.3 Reaches End of Life, Users Urged to Upgrade to Linux 6.4 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Mozilla Thunderbird 115 Released with Supernova UI, OpenPGP Improvements
description:
Mozilla Thunderbird 115 open-source email client is now available for download with a refreshed UI called Supernova, improved OpenPGP support, and numerous other changes.

The post Mozilla Thunderbird 115 Released with Supernova UI, OpenPGP Improvements appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: fwupd 1.9.3 Adds Support for More Thunderbolt 4 Docks, TUXEDO InfinityBook Pro 13 v3
description:
fwupd 1.9.3 Linux firmware updating utility is now available for download with support for new devices, as well as new features, improvements, and multiple bug fixes.

The post fwupd 1.9.3 Adds Support for More Thunderbolt 4 Docks, TUXEDO InfinityBook Pro 13 v3 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: SUSE Announces RHEL Fork to Preserve Choice in Enterprise Linux
description:
SUSE announces that it will fork Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) using publicly available sources and develop an RHEL-compatible distribution that will be available to everyone without any restrictions.

The post SUSE Announces RHEL Fork to Preserve Choice in Enterprise Linux appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
